amendment.description: To modify the limitations applicable to payments under incentives clauses in chemical demilitarization contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4279 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S5933-5937; text: CR S5933) To modify the limitations applicable to payments under incentives clauses in chemical demilitarization contracts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4279 proposed by Senator Warner.
